phrases: People might laugh and say it is just a fairy tale.
That these mysterious things could not really happen.
But this is the true story of my mother.
Mother was a student at a university just outside of Tokyo.
but goodness, truth, beauty, and arete...
Mother saw Father for the first time at the university.
Wearing a shirt with a stretched-out collar, using no textbook-
Mother said he was completely different from the other students
as she watched him from behind earnestly taking notes.
If you do not turn it in, you will be marked absent.
If that bothers you, I will not come anymore.
I do not care if you are a student or not,
but the lecture can be hard to understand without a textbook.
Do you want to share mine?
I will put this here, then.
The accusers in this case were the poet Meletus,
the politically powerful Anytus, and the sophist Lycon.
but Anytus is said to have pulled the strings from behind.
What do you think is fun?
What kind of food do you like?
What were the people you loved in the past like?
When I was born, cosmos were blooming in the garden.
They had not been planted by anyone, but grew there naturally.
My dad said that looking at them made him think of my name.
He wanted me to be a child who always smiled, like the flowers.
to just keep smiling, even if the smile became forced.
Because then I could overcome most things, he said.
That is why during Dad's funeral, I was smiling the whole time.
But then, my relatives said that was improper, and they were very angry with me.
I suppose it really was improper, was not it?
Even in the same housing complex, each room is completely different inside.
Families with money, poor families, big families, people living alone,
families with babies, elderly living alone...
I bet it would be nice to have my own house.
To say, I am home and take off my shoes, wash my face and hands, and sink into a chair.
And once that bookcase was full of books, I would build a new bookcase.
I would be able to do whatever I wanted because it would be my own house.
There is something I have to tell you.
Hakujuji Christmas Cakes Western Sweets Coffee
I have never told anyone before.
I was afraid you would leave if I told you, but I should have told you sooner.
Close your eyes for a second.
what do I look like to you?
She found out that transforming during the full moon
and attacking people was just a legend.
The world is full of things I do not know, Mother thought.
Father was a descendant of the Honshuu wolf,
which had become extinct about a hundred years ago.
With both wolf and human blood, he was the last of his kind.
When Father was a child, his parents told him about the history of his extinct ancestors.
They told him not to reveal the truth to anyone, and then died.
After that, he was taken in by relatives who knew nothing of this
and had a hard time as he grew into an adult.
After getting his driver's license, he went to the city to look for work.
Unknown and unheeded by men, Father said that he had lived in hiding until now.
Natural Birth: Kind to your body and soul
Mother gave birth to me in that small apartment.
Not at the hospital, without even a midwife,
my parents delivered me by themselves.
Mother was worried that if I had been born as a wolf,
the doctors would have been surprised.
I am glad she was born safely.
Do you think she will be a kind child?
She might be a smart kid.
I wonder what kind of adult she will be?
A nurse, a teacher, or a baker-
whatever it is, I want her to have a job she loves.
I want her to have a happy, healthy life free of troubles.
Let us watch over her until she grows up.
My little brother was born in the spring of the next year.
Suddenly, Father was nowhere to be seen.
I do not know what Father was thinking that day.
Maybe he instinctively went to hunt for food for his new baby.
Maybe he wanted something nutritious for Mother,
who was recovering from the birth.
I am leaving the kids to you, Mother thought she could hear him say.
I will make sure to raise them properly.
Mother had a lot of trouble with us after that, but I do not remember anything about it.
I said, it is almost done.
When I was angry or upset,
my fur would bristle, and I would turn into a wolf.
Oh all right, you can have a biscuit first.
crying for food from morning until night.
Completely different from my sickly brother, Ame, who ate little.
Mother had to quit school and leave her part-time job
in order to take care of us.
We lived on the small savings Father had left behind.
According to Mother, my brother and I seemed like we were not sure
if we were supposed to be humans or wolves.
she had no choice but to study on her own.
Breastfeeding every two hours, day and night.
When Ame would not suck on his own,
she learned to feed him with cotton pads dipped in breast milk.
But when he would not drink any milk or stop crying,
she did not know what to do
except pat him on the back and comfort him the whole night.
As a result, Mother was quickly becoming exhausted.
Thanks to this, even if it was just for a short time,
she could fall asleep at a moment's notice.
What really caused problems was when we got sick.
The pediatrician or the veterinarian- she did not know which one to take us to.
My daughter swallowed some desiccant by mistake-
It says silica gel on it.
She regretted not asking Father about how he was raised as a child.
I want to go for a walk.
You were sick just a little while ago.
Okay, let us go for a walk!
I said, put your ears away!
But that was not the only problem.
What time do you think it is?!
You keep making such a racket night after night!
At least discipline your kids properly-!
The contract said pets are not allowed here, did not it?
I do not have any pets.
I know what is going on.
If you think you can do whatever you want,
then I will have no choice but to have you go elsewhere.
Yes, we have some serious misgivings about your children.
Our records show that they have never had regular checkups or vaccines.
If that is the case, can we at least see them?
We just want to see if what you are saying is true or not.
If you do not let us in, you could be suspected of abuse or neglect!
What do you want to do from now on?
Do you want to be human, or wolf?
So that you can choose whichever one you want.
Ever since the town hall started presenting unoccupied houses,
people who want to live in the country have been coming steadily,
As you can see, there is nothing here.
The elementary school and hospital are both thirty minutes away by car.
The junior high is two and a half hours by bus and train, one way.
That is five hours round trip!
No matter how much you want to raise your children in a good environment-
The town is a lot more convenient, in my opinion.
And I know the rent is practically free,
but you know, the cost of repairs is nothing to laugh at.
Instead of calling it an unoccupied house- oh, you can keep your shoes on-
-it is more like an abandoned house.
But at least there is electricity, and the mountain stream is not dried out,
and they said you could use whatever is in the she would.
That is a field, is not it?
Oh, this place is not really suitable for growing your own food.
Animals come down from the mountains and damage the crops.
Even if you make the effort to grow vegetables, they will all get eaten.
This place is full of unoccupied houses because the humans are getting kicked out.
There is not anyone around for miles.
Shall we look at a different place?
There might be a better place near the village...
I have decided on this place.
She said she wanted a place with no neighbors close by.
She was a little different, if you know what I mean.
Then how does she expect to take care of her kids?
We will be in your care from now on.
I guess we will have to be more frugal from now on.
I was just thinking that we should at least be able to grow our own vegetables.
It is our little secret that you two are wolf children.
If you were to suddenly become wolves, everyone would be very surprised.
So you cannot become wolves in front of other people.
If you meet other animals in the mountains, you cannot act like you are better than them.
Because Daddy will feel sad about it.
The angry villagers chased after the wolf with guns.
I will not do it again,' the boastful wolf cried as he ran away.
Is it okay if I take the fallen leaves from the woods?
No one would ask for permission to take that stuff!
I wonder how long she will last.
She will start talking about convenience stores and karaoke soon enough.
I will get it right this time...
You are weak even though you are a wolf, so they have got it in for you.
You will not be able to survive like that!
I would not lose to a wild boar!
Yup, and a monkey and a serow.
But I was not scared at all.
It was fun when they ran away when I chased them.
That you would not act like you were better than the other animals?
Do the all better thing again.
But, how do wolf children become adults, anyway?
Wolves start learning to hunt at around four months old.
First, they learn what hunting is with mice and other small animals.
As they get older, they form teams with adult wolves...
Ame, I wonder if this wild grass is edible...
There was a stream over there, and...
Why is the wolf always the bad guy?
You mean, in the picture books?
Everyone hates them, and they are always killed in the end...
If that is the case, I do not want to be a wolf.
But you know, Mommy likes wolves.
Even if everyone else hates the wolf, I will take the wolf's side.
What is going to happen to us now?
I have got to learn more!
I was going to visit earlier, but it got so busy around here...
It is hard to grow your own food, is not it?
Even when I do what it says in the book, I keep messing up.
But this is a nice place, is not it?
Plants do not grow overnight, you know.
At this rate, it will be the same no matter how many times you try.
Is not that what you think?
Even if you smile, you will not be able to do anything.
No, it is Mommy's fault for not knowing anything.
Even though you are an adult?
I should have asked your Daddy about more things.
It is raining cats and dogs!
You mean the ones you plant in the fields?
Is there anything else you can do with them?
Do not worry about what Dad said.
That is just how he is.
Grandpa Nirasaki, thank you for the seed potatoes.
Ah, are you trying to let them go to waste?
You have to start over from the soil.
You will not get anything done hoeing like that.
Did you use leaves when you prepared the soil?
Then you do not need fertilizer.
When you are done, clear this field, too.
I do not need such a big field.
I just need to grow enough for my kids and me.
In a week, plant them cut-side down.
Um, thank you for teaching me how to...
If you plant chamomile and cabbage together,
bugs will not attack and the flavors will be better.
No, you want celery with your cabbage.
No, no, it is better for novices to use this.
You cannot fill up a stomach on chamomile.
You should plant them shallowly like this.
No, you should water the hole before you put anything in.
No, no, you can water them later.
You should just sprinkle the extra fertilizer like this.
If you put too much, it will just bring more bugs.
You have to pile it on.
No, you only need a little.
If you do what this guy says, you will definitely fail.
It is made from the smoke when charcoal is produced.
Thank you for coming all this way to help.
Sorry about showing up without warning like this.
It is hard working the land if you are not used to it, is not it?
I still have a lot I have to learn.
There are a lot of city folks who get discouraged
and leave right after moving here.
Oh no, these were retired old men.
It was hilarious how weak they were mentally.
I do not know if it means anything if I say it, but this is not an easy place to live off the land.
The drainage is not very good.
And we get a lot of snow.
We have to help each other.
We thought you did not want anything to do with the neighbors.
There are only a few young mothers around, so it is nice to have someone else around.
Let us know if you have any questions.
You are living off your savings?
But I need to start working soon.
It is hard to find work around here.
Everyone leaves their kids at the preschool and commutes to work.
Why do not Ame and I go?
-Well, that is because... -I want to go to preschool, too!
I want to go I want to go I want to go...!
I want to go to the preschool...!
Yuki, hurry up and finish your food.
I know it is supposed to be a secret...
Hana, did you get a dog?
N-No, that is... -is not it, dear?
There are no wolves in Japan anymore.
That is a shepherd mixed with something else.
Oh, you and the dog have matching clothes!
I wonder where Grandpa Nirasaki is...
It was thanks to everyone is help.
Ours were destroyed, so this will really help.
Oh, thank you for bringing this.
It came and dug everything up without making a sound.
It came all the way down to Sakai's fields this year.
The only fields with no animal damage are yours, Hana.
It is strange, even though you are so deep in the mountains.
Do you have some kind of trick?
Everyone wants to know how you did it.
Yuki's a lively child, is not she?
It is been a while since we had eggs.
Let me know when you run out!
Oh my, is not that cute!
Oh, you do not have to give us something so big...
It was just sitting in the storage she would.
If we bring it back, Gramps'll get mad at us.
He is always talking about you, Hana.
Because he is fallen for her.
Come on, he is already ninety.
But he even told everyone to help her and everything.
He said not to say anything about that, remember?!
So that is what it was...?
I finally understand why I needed a bigger field.
Why are you always smiling and laughing?
We moved here trying to get away from prying eyes...
When did we end up in the care of the people from the village?
It was hard at first, but I think we will do fine here.
It was a really nice-looking bird.
I felt like even I could catch it today.
It was completely different from how it usually feels.
Suddenly, I felt like I could do anything.
Mother said later that she had never been more frightened in her life.
After that incident, Ame seemed like a completely different person.
I will not turn into a wolf.
Then remember, Piggy promise, promise kept.
It is a charm to keep you from becoming a wolf.
That is how you do it.
It was the first time in my life
that I had ever been surrounded by so many people.
-I had wanted to go so badly...
-...but when it finally came down to it,
I was not sure if I would be okay or not.
But that was just at the beginning.
Who knows the answer to this question?
Niikawa Nature Sanctuary Nature Conservationist Assistant Wanted
My name is Tendo, and I am a nature conservationist.
I look forward to working with you.
A nature conservationist's job is not just to protect nature.
Environmental education, field surveys, the conservation of plants and animals-
These three pillars of conservancy are made possible by the support of volunteers.
We do many different types of work, so while we are specialists,
we also need to be able to do a little of everything.
So, we are looking for someone who can help the conservationist with all the work, but...
Honestly speaking, we cannot pay very much.
We can pay enough to cover training expenses
for someone studying to become a conservationist,
but we cannot afford much more than that.
A high schooler's part-time job pays a lot more per hour.
Um... I heard that you have a wolf here...
He is not that young anymore.
I came because I have something to ask you.
I am his mother, but I do not know how to raise a wolf.
How did you learn the ways of the wolf?
Will you tell us how you were raised in the forest?
A wealthy person got special permission to keep him as a pet,
but when the owner died there was no one to take him, so he came to live with us.
Apparently, he was born in the Moscow Zoo.
So he is not from the wild?
I think it is rare to see wild wolves in zoos.
If they are bred, the babies are sent out to be fostered.
There are also wild birds and raccoon dogs who are brought here when they get hurt.
I am going to start coming here from now on.
Ame, you will be okay coming with me, right?
I will learn about the mountains and nature as I work,
and teach you the things I learn.
It was my first time seeing a real one.
Because he seemed kind of sad, somehow.
Mommy wants to see him again, too.
As Mother settled into her new job, I was undergoing a huge shock.
I found out that no other girls played with rat snakes for fun.
Look, these used to be my mom's.
My parents bought this for me for my last birthday.
Yuki, show us your treasure box, too!
I was also the only girl who collected small animal bones and dried reptiles.
The moment I realized that other girls did not do those things,
From then on, I was going to act more graceful and ladylike.
I am seriously worrying about this!
Why do not you just do what you want, Yuki?
I do not want people looking at me funny!
I guess it cannot be helped.
When Mother made a new dress for me, I remember being really happy.
Thanks to the dress, I was able to fit in with my class
Oh, Yuki, your dress is so cute!
-Heaven only knows how much that dress helped me.
-Heaven only knows how much that dress helped me.
it was hard to get Ame to school.
It is Piggy promise, promise kept.
Oh, Ame, is it a school holiday?
Sorry for always bringing him here.
-You can see frogs that still have their tails.
-Hana, can you help me for a sec?
Let me introduce a transfer student.
Why do not you greet everyone?
Hey, do you have dogs at your house?
You smell kind of like animals.
We do not have any dogs.
I totally thought you had dogs.
Maybe it is just my imagination...
I will go with this one!
Yuki, you should come join us.
Oh, I have to return this book.
She is not usually like that...
Did I do something to you?
Do you dislike me because I am a transfer student?
That is it, is not it?
Then why are you avoiding me?
Sorry to bother you during work.
Do you know how much his head was bleeding?
She would not talk no matter what we asked her...
Were you really the one who hurt him?
I am very sorry for what my child has done.
That is how it is, Mrs. Fujii.
There is the school's insurance for the medical bills, so-
Do you really think this can be taken care of with just an apology?!
What were you planning to do if he lost his hearing?
Parents are responsible for their children's actions, are not they?
Would you go into debt or sell your house to compensate us?
Now, now, this is not the place to-
If you do not let me hear what she is thinking, I will-
It was a wolf that did it.
Do not decide whose fault it is already!
No matter how many times I tried the charm.
Will I be chased out of school?
Will we have to leave our house?
She went to play at Shino's house today.
You came a long way, did not you?
Thank you for coming by every day.
I do not want Yuki to stop coming to school.
You know, that day, you said that a wolf did it, right?
What did you mean by that?
You might not believe me, but that day, I saw a wolf for a split second,
and when I came to, I was bleeding.
So the wolf was the one who did it.
I mean, it was not Yuki's fault.
I know other kids are saying stupid things, but...
Can I ask you one more thing?
Hey, you want to see this?
It is cool, is not it?
I am going to Sensei's place.
Will you be okay by yourself?
Do not stay out too late.
She went back to school today.
He comes and goes, I guess.
There is something to be said
for a guy who stops going to school in elementary school.
Edison and I were both like that.
There you go, saying such irresponsible things again!
Speaking of which, does anyone live on the mountain?
Ame said he was going to Sensei's place...
I was sure he was talking about Grandpa Nirasaki, but...
I do not know about that...
No one would go into the mountains during the busy farming season.
He knows everything about the mountain.
I did not think you would make friends with someone older than you.
Bring him over to our house sometime.
I want to thank him, and-
Sensei does not meet with humans.
He does not come down to the village like the wild boars and bears.
But it is probably okay if it is you, Mom.
Sensei is the master of the entire mountain in these parts.
Thank you for always taking care of Ame.
You can take a bath now.
Yuki, you should have Sensei teach you, too.
Your hunting will get a lot better.
There is a trick to running through the forest at full speed.
And to reading the terrain, too.
How to find water and how to read the weather,
and marking your territory and getting along with others-
There is no way I am going.
Why will not you come to school?
Because there is a lot I do not know.
I do not need to know.
I have already decided not to become a wolf.
You are a wolf, are not you?
Why do not you act like one?
If you do not come to school tomorrow, I will never forgive you!
Yuki and Ame are both starting to walk their own paths.
Even though that is what I wanted...
My last summer in elementary school, there were a number of record-breaking storms.
Ame started to go into the mountains all the time.
He seemed to be very worried about the effects of the heavy rains
on Sensei and the plants and animals of the mountains.
Where have you been all this time?
Hang on, I will get the bath ready.
Sensei... hurt his leg, and he cannot move.
Someone has to take over all the things he has been doing on the mountain.
You cannot go into the mountains anymore.
You are only ten years old.
Even if a ten-year-old wolf is an adult, you are still-
Please do not go into the mountains anymore.
Then Sohei will have a new dad?
But Sohei does not know about this yet.
You cannot tell anyone about this!
How many points do we have now?
Today, it will be sunny during the day,
but heavy rain will start in the evening and continue overnight.
-Please use caution if you go out during this time.
-Today will start mostly sunny with high atmospheric pressure within the prefecture,
-Stay with Mom. -but the weather front will extend to the Sea of Japan,
-You will miss the bus- -causing stormy weather from the evening into the night.
-In the northwest region, it will be sunny followed by rain,
The southwest region will be sunny followed by rain.
-The northeast region will be sunny with scattered showers.
-The southeast region will be sunny with scattered showers.
-Do not forget your umbrellas when you go out today.
So the problem is asking, how far can the swallow fly in three hours?
First of all, do you know what seventy km/h means?
km/h means the number of kilometers traveled per hour.
So in one hour, the swallow can fly seventy kilometers.
The weather front along the Sea of Japan is moving south,
and atmospheric conditions have become extremely unstable.
there will be lightning and sudden gusts accompanying the heavy rains.
Predicted rainfall is, depending on the location,
over seventy mm per hour in the flat areas, and near the mountains,
over one hundred mm per hour.
The weather station has issued a heavy rain flood warning.
Use extreme caution due to possible landslides, rises in river level, submersion of buildings,
And now, for today's eleven of the clock weather alerts.
In the northwest region, heavy rain, lightning, and flood warnings.
It looks like there will be severe rainstorms soon,
so afternoon classes have been canceled.
Until they come, gather in the gym according to where you live.
Ame, let us go pick up Yuki together.
J Yankee Doodle came to town- J
If we have to stay at the school overnight,
we can play cards all night.
I will go get the cards from the classroom.
Do you even know how to play cards?
I only know how to play Old Maid.
It is a raging storm out there.
Yuki, we can take you home, too.
Oh yeah, let us go, Yuki.
Thank you for offering, but I think my mom will be here soon.
You do not have to hold back.
I do not want to miss my mom when she comes.
What, did Yuki go home already?
We will take everyone that is left home in the school's car.
I guess we are the only ones not getting picked up.
I wonder if something happened to my mom.
What will we do if no one comes to pick us up?
We can just live at school.
We can sleep in the nurse's office at night.
We can eat leftover cafeteria food.
What if no one ever comes to pick us up?
Will you live at school forever?
I just have to get a job.
No one's going to hire you.
I will lie about my age.
I will tell them that I am in middle school.
Do I look like a middle schooler?
I want to grow up faster.
I feel like it is going to suck me in.
Will we really end up living here secretly?
If our parents do not come, then we have no choice, do we?
Your morn will come for sure.
And she is having a baby.
So once it is born, I will not be needed anymore.
But she was so worried about you...
I am fine with that, though.
I will run away from home and become a boxer or a wrestler.
I will live like a lone wolf.
You will be defeated in a second.
I will train and live on my own.
Sou, I want to be like you,
and be able to smile even when I am telling the truth.
the wolf that hurt you was me...
I kept thinking that I had to say something.
It hurt to hold it in.
I did not tell anyone your secret.
I am not crying, these are drops of rain.
Come on, hurry back so we can go pick up Yuki...
It is been hard, has not it?
I was watching you the whole time.
Yuki and Ame have both grown up fine.
He is found his own world.
I still have not been able to do anything for you.
Mother said that she would never forget that morning.
Like the world had been reborn overnight.
Municipal Junior High School Entrance Ceremony
Looking back on the twelve years she spent raising us,
Mother smiled, saying that it was over in a moment, like a fairy tale.
Mother is living quietly in that mountain house even now.
I hope to meet you soon,
I always prayed as I rubbed my belly
I see my reflection in your big eyes
As teardrops spill onto your cheeks
(Pitter patter) Come on, let us go for a walk!
Your eyes swollen, you sit with your arms around your knees
Tell me why you are crying, tell me everything
Do not worry, I am not going anywhere
No matter what happens, we will be together
It makes me feel better, even when I am down
Come on, let us raise our voices together!
I want you to grow up brightly and freely
Running in the snow, counting clouds
Playing in the rain, being blown by the wind
Buried under flowers, playing grass kazoos
On four feet, on two feet
The world is yours for the taking
The world is full of mystery
Choosing one of two paths, eyes fixed on a point far away
Is there nothing else I can do for you?
Whenever you decide to leave, I will see you off with a smile
But I will still be a little sad
